mapper.select: SELECT a.`wishSeq` AS wishSeq, a.`email` AS email, a.`menuNo` AS menuNo, b.`menuName` AS menuName, b.`thumb` AS thumb, b.`descript` AS descript, b.`price` AS price FROM `wishList` AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN `menu` AS b ON a.`menuNo` = b.`menuNo` AND b.`deleteYN` = 'Y' AND b.`lastRevision` = 'Y' WHERE a.`email` = #{email} LIMIT #{pg}, 10
